import React from 'react' import { Grid, Table, Header } from 'semantic-ui-react' import CakeForm from '../misc/CakeForm' function CakeTable({ cakes, cakeDescription, handleInputChange, handleCreateCake }) { let cakeList if (!cakes || cakes.length === 0) { cakeList = ( No Cake ) } else { cakeList = cakes.map(cake => { return ( {cake.title} {cake.description} {cake.image} ) }) } return ( <>
Cake
Title Image Description {cakeList}
) } export default CakeTable
